cause.description:
Planting bacteria on frog’s skin will help to save amphibians from their global decline. The use of various forms of contraception in humans will leave enough natural environmental space for the poor little toadstool huggers to frolic, copulate and secrete all the exciting varieties of dimethytryptamine which aid in the enlightenment of us the ape people. All members should start mounting RIS M203 grenade launchers And RPG-7’s to your balconies, roofs and to the most effective angles of your vehicles, for the dispersion of our custom made grenades and rockets filled with our genetically enhanced primordial soup, tadpoles and all the relevant bacteria needed to start the evolution of our new super frogs. Target all densely populated urban areas, do this preferably madly intoxicated to make you revolutionary work more exciting and satisfying. Intoxication may be acquired by licking of the existing frogs or the intranasal, intraocular, intraanal, intravaginal, intrapulmonary, intravenous, intramuscular, subcutaneous, transdermal or intradermal intake of the grenade fragment shrapnel. This is the psychonaut connoisseur’s choice, which ever will prove most successful in your conquest.
1. Immediate global dispersion of contraception and free bacterial spores, download of rocket launcher advanced simulator urban warrior version 1.5
cause.name: Save the frogs fuck the people
